title: A QB Class Divided
description:
Mina is joined by Football Outsider's Derrik Klassen to discuss the quarterback and wide receiver prospects in this year's draft, who from these groups stand out to them, and who they are not as high on as the national consensus.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
